top_comments.comment: Is Rao's better  choice than the ORGANIC brand????
Did Bobby move to Florida? I’ve been away from this channel for a while.

comments_since_last_sample.body: I just watched a special on Chinese tomatoes. Label doesn’t have to say where tomatoes are grown just where processed (at least here in Canada). China has poor reputation for abusing workers. I wonder about Rao’s.
What do you think about certain doctors saying that fructose in fruit is really bad for you.
Where is the link to try thrive market?
Rao's is the best. In San Diego it's available at all the warehouses I've been.
Just curious, how do u feel about produce from other countries labeled organic? I’m at a loss in the produce departments.
I love costco deals but staffs are so rude.  I guess they treat customers at discount rate.
Did Bobby move to Florida? I’ve been away from this channel for a while.
